law.text: The purpose of KRS 387.855 to 387.910 is primarily to establish a framework by which a disabled individual who qualifies as a special needs person, or his or her family, care manager, or fiduciary, shall have access to the courts to secure the benefits of federal and state law public assistance benefits as set forth in 42 U.S.C. sec. 1396p. In construing various provisions of KRS 387.855 to 387.910, the court shall be mindful of this purpose.
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 18, effective July 12, 2012.
